metadata.title: CVE-2024-2177 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross Window Forgery vulnerability exists within GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions from 16.3 prior to 16.11.5, 17.0 prior to 17.0.3, and 17.1prior to 17.1.1. This condition allows for an attacker to abuse the OAuthauthentication flow via a crafted payload.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
